review: This game is incredible! It's as simple as that it's the type of game you don't have to deticate hours of your life to to play but it is also the type of game that can get really addictive. Roughly 5 minute matches make it the perfect game for people who have minimal time but once you play a chain of games hours of fun can be experienced. Personally I enjoy this game so much due to its multiplayer. You can play for fun or play competitively with your mates and rank up together. You have full customisation of your car (Aside from 2 DLC cars) so you can enjoy the game in your own unique way. This game does contain downloadable content but it is not pay to play. The DLCs in this game are 100% vanity and will not really affect the experience of your gameplay. Also the developers and the creators of this game actually LISTEN and will make and keep updates and DLCs that the customers enjoy. I highly respect that. The servers are placed globally so you can connect to UK US and more international servers. I would seriously recommend this game and the best thing is it is relatively cheap for the amount of fun I guarentee you will have. Enjoy! D
title: Rocket League®

This is far and above my favorite game I've ever played and probably the best 20 dollars I could spend. review: Great game. I have almost 700 hours in this game for good reason. Rocket League is easy to learn and difficult to master and has a great learning curve. The devs actively try to improve the game's features functionality and fairness. It is very satisfying to finally hit the ball well then to hit it into the goal then to start doing aerials and aerial goals and many more tricks and skills. It looks great feels great and is overall a fun game with great features such as cross platform splitscreen and great car customization. Side note If you do buy this game on PC (which you would if you're on Steam) try to start with a controller and not a keyboard and mouse. A game pad has more functionality in Rocket League and other driving games and has a higher skill ceiling than a kb/m. Plus if you do switch from kb/m to controller at a higher level like I did you'd have a hard time adjusting to the different control style.

review: Ahh what isn't there to compliment in this masterpiece of a game? At first glance soccer with RC cars can sound a little... odd. But this game is so much fun that even someone who has no interest in cars (me) or soccer (still me) can fall in love with this gift that Psyonix has bestowed upon us. If you don't have friends you can play solo and if you do have friends you can play with them too. I have the most fun staying up late playing with my buddies laughing and screaming with satisfaction if one of us scores a crazy goal. There's nothing more fulfilling than scoring a double touch aerial or juking someone so hard that all you can do is prey for their ankles.Best game of 2015. Best online multiplayer game I've ever played. Best sports game I've ever played. 10/10Do yourself a favor and buy this game. Remember it's easy to learn but hard to master.I'll never be as good as Kronovi. '(

review: It's a great game you have to play as if you were at least 2 people in order to win any ranked unless you have found someone your level and are queing with them. If you're solo queue you will be placed with people still learning the game (even though their account says master/rocketeer) with low turn rates no ability to save even a medium difficulty goal and an even worse reaction time. It's agrivating to then see their rank higher than yours even though you consistently have more points in every aspect. I can understand if it's me not seeing what I'm doing wrong but it's past that point. I cannot find one rando in solo q that will be better than me. I am not saying that to try and stroke my own pride. If you do get lucky and find a solo q teammate who isn't fully inept add them immediately. You won't find anyone better than you they don't exist. You can sit in goal making up for their mistakes then leave goal after their rotation is done so that you can try (as the only one on the team able to make a goal) to go shoot but you're then going to need to be back in your goal after shooting because your teammate won't be there. He will be trying to defend goal from mid field and at that point they will launch it with a side wall pinch or just shoot and it will go into the goal without fail over your teammates head. No matter how much you've done in that game in terms of saving offense and supplemental it wont matter. You've already taken 4 minutes and 24 seconds of defending hardcore and luckily managing to solo juke for a goal. But remember they slammed the ball into the wall without any purpose other than getting it away from you. It goes past your teammate because they're too busy watching from 15 feet behind you as they're too used to the ball never going higher than half way to the ceiling. They get a goal and end up then winning ot because your teammate gives up blaming it on the fact that they had picked up momentum after the first goal. After going through this same story for about 1.6k hours it gets a little tiring saying things like 'Was a nice try' and at the end of the game 'gl next time'. When you lose because you have above 1k points while your teammate has at most 200 the other team starts talking smack like '2ez' even though nothing has been said on either side all game. There's no winning in this game. If you're a nice player you only tend to find people playing the game for fun. More losses. If you are an you are viewed as confident and get other confident s who most of the time are still incompetent and are worse in the fact that they will not understand what they don't do correctly and will openly deny it in the end making no progress for themselves so you can't rank up with them for more than a couple divs before they get raged at everything.From my standpoint this is how the game goes. People who are too proud to be open minded and others who just want to have fun. There is almost no in between. It's a toxic game not toxic like csgo or league but it's toxic in a sometimes intelligent way. It mirror's peoples love for soccer in real life and I love the game for that aspect. All in all your teammates if you are not queued with a friend will either be slow because they are trying to play for fun because they got carried to a higher rank they should be in and are now trying to play it for themselves (ty smurfs you're doing the lords work for everyone under you) or you will find angry children who can't even see all aspects of this game. Fun game but not fun trying to rank alone.
title: Rocket League®

review: I rarely write reviews but because this is such a unique game I know there will probably be a lot of people still on the fence about buying this game and I figured an extra voice couldn't do any harm...This is hands down one of my favourite games of all time it is extremely rewarding and even though you will be absolutely shocking at the start the satisfaction from the progression from being an absolute noob to being able to achieving a crazy aerial goal (albeit luckily).This is best played with friends but if you play enough you'll soon find rocket league is full of great people and I've made some amazing friends with strangers through casual games. If you lead a busy life don't worry because the beauty of rocket league is that you can just drop in for a couple games yet you may struggle because IT'S JUST SO DAMN ADDICTING.

review: Pros The gameplay is a lot of fun easy to learn hard to master. Controls are pretty simple but i would recommend to customize it a little on gamepads (LB Air roll left and RB Air roll right). At the beginning it takes a while to get the hang of hitting the ball right like you want it.But with a bit of training and matching up you ll get it eventually.Graphics are good no epical super graphics but still pretty nice. But it s better this way so you dont need an ultra high end computer. Car models remind me on hot wheels. The maps graphical designs and variaty is very nice. From space station halo style to future soccer stadium style to old McDonald had a farm style. And i expect more to come.Cons The guy who constantly chases the ball.The guy who leaves as soon you as you trail by one.The guy who is always trying to destroy you.The guy who doesnt go for the ball even though you quick chatted Take the shot! The guy who goes for the ball even though you quick chatted I got it! The guy who is afkThe guy who tries to freestyle but can t.The guy who flames even though he is the one that sucks.The guy who constantly misses the ball.The guy who drives away from the goalie position.The guy who drives to the goalie position even though there is a goalie already.The guy who is just driving around randomly.The guy who wants to trade but noticed his keys have still cooldown time.The guy who is driving in circles taking all the boosts all the time.The guy who always fails. A liitle Rocket League story Rocket League Player Unknowns Diary______________________________________________________________________________Day one I noticed a stinch of fuel in the air. The countdown was counting down.............. It went down to zero and i had no real sense of what i m doing. I put the pedal to the metal but no use. I missed a big ball with the size of of a big ball. Our enemy seems to be too expirienced to get beaten.Overpowererd by the overpowering enemy the odds were against us. The enemy took the shot and i went for the epical save with a move not that epical. Infact i missed the oversized ball.It was 1 0 on the scoreboard and the clock said 4 52 minutes left. It felt like an eternity.The countdown was counting down................. again. My teammate went for the kick off oh yeahh and me too and my other teammate also. Suddenly there was a bright light that overwhelmed the whole playfield. Everyone was stunned. Top left corner said Rocket Jesus joined the match.Too bad i wasn t in the christian team. Rocket Jesus drove up the wall with the ball started to dribble through the air flipped around like the real Jesus would have done it if he had a car that can fly.Another goal. Enlightend by the moves of RocketJesus i went to the training grounds of the gods the free play.______________________________________________________________________________Day2 DeletedDay3 DeletedDay5 DeletedDay6 DeletedDay7 DeletedDay8 DeletedDay9 DeletedDay10 DeletedDay11 DeletedDay12 Deleted..............................______________________________________________________________________________Day 379 After months of training and training matches and matches that weren t training i finally see the light of freestyle.I started the match and again the countdown was counting down. I boosted to double jump and than boost again to hit the ball.I had the first touch. The ball rolled up the wall and i went after it. I tip toed the ball from the wall to the air i used my second jump just 1.5 seconds after i jumped from the wall to hit the ball to the enemy goal. I flew after the ball 360 flippin through the air because i had 70% boost left. Suddenly a bright flash again and the top left corner said Rocket Jesus joined the match....................again. I was dribbling through the air to the enemy goal when Rocket Jesus went for the epical save and started the counter attack. The ball flew through the air again and Motor Moses Rocket Jesus his teammate went for the redirect. Motor Moses redirected the ball straight to our goal when our teammate Nero the slayer of christians saved the ball with a super dooper mega barrel roll. Stunned by the amazing beauty of the save Rocket Jesus started crying.Our counter attack was fast and furious tryhard and the enemy team had no chance to save the ball. Countless tryhard attacks left the enemy no chance to recover from the countless goals we made.10 1 on scoreboard and still 2 minutes left on the clock. Overpowered by our overpowering power in tryharding Rocket Jesus and Motor Moses forveited the match leaving their best buddy Prophet of Redirect Mohamed behind on the battlefield. Two followers of the Prophet Maverick and Wolfman joined the cause with no use. They were just stupid minions. I tried to put an end to the prophets misery with the ultra giga hellfire spinner shot. But the prophet made one of the most epical saves in history. Unlucky his teammate Wolfman was too stupid putting the ball in the own goal.I looked at the clock still 1 10 minutes remaining and the score was 14 1 andfinally the last enemy realized he had no chance. He gave up leavin us in our glorious tryharding victory.
title: Rocket League®

review: My message today is titled Life is hard and it s about how to live a great life despite the fact that life is difficult.Everybody wants to be happy in life. We all want to live a perfect life. We want that great job or a successful business. We want to be married to Mr. Right or Mrs Perfect. We want to have great kids. We want to have friends that stick by us come rain or shine. We want to be able to have all the material things life has to offer and have all our problems just disappear.Everybody wishes for good life. It may be at different levels. One person may define a good life one way and another may describe it another way. For one person a good life may be just having three meals a day and a roof over their head. For another it may be having a huge mansion and a couple of million dollars in the bank.There are different levels and meanings to what a good life is. But whatever you definition of it there is perhaps one thing that you may have in common with many other people. You might want that good life stress free. You would like to have it without having to work so hard or struggle so much for it. That is a normal human expectation. Nobody likes to struggle through life.Unfortunately that is also what may be stopping you from having that great life. The thought of all that work all that planning overcoming hurdles and resistance is enough to make a lot of people give up before they even start. It can all seem too overwhelming and for many it all just doesn t seem be worth it. It s like being drained of energy just at the thought of running a marathon. Before you are even at the starting line the thought of all that running just scares you and tires you so much mentally you just decide not to go for it. It s just too hard.One of my favourite books is titled The Road Less Travelled by M. Scott Peck. The first sentence in the book is Life is difficult. Now if you pick up a book and the first thing it tells you is life is difficult you may just think is this book going to get reassuring and encouraging after such a start?But as Peck goes on to explain once you accept that life is hard it no longer becomes an issue that it s difficult. He says Once we know that life is difficult once we truly understand and accept it then life is no longer difficult. In life you will have difficulties getting anything you want. It is very rare to get anything in life without some degree of effort. Only if you win the lottery will you have everything without effort and even then you would have had to go out and buy the lottery ticket anyway so it s not free at all.Life is hard your boss will not always be the nicest person in the world. Your job will have challenges that you did not foresee. Your workmates will sometimes be a pain. You won t always get the salary and recognition that you want and deserve at work. Your clients may not be the nicest people in the world.Life is hard your kids won t always be the ideal kids you want them to be. Your wife or husband may not be as perfect as you thought they were when you married them in fact I can guarantee you they are not. Your home may not be the ideal place you would want it to be. You may not the perfect wife or husband that you once thought you were.Life is hard running a business is not as easy as you thought it would be. No one is lining up to bring money to your business even though you are a really nice person and your business has great products to offer.I could go on and on with these examples but the bottom line is that Life is hard. I don t mean to say in all this that you don t deserve a break. I am not saying that you are not justified in thinking that you deserve more than what you have gotten from life and the world to this point.I am not saying that you are not justified in feeling the way that you feel. I know you have had it tough at times. I know that at times you feel that it s all very confusing and just too hard. I mean you have worked very hard. You ve done all that you possibly could in your life whether it is at work or at home. But things just don t seem to have worked out as well as you had planned or hoped. It all just seems to have gone wrong and you don t know or understand how or why.But that s okay. It s normal. That s what being human is all about. That s what life is all about. Life is hard. Accept that.Once you do you will feel better about your circumstances. Then you won t think of your situation as anything but what is common to every human being. Then you will think of your situation as a part of life. You will no longer beat yourself up about how bad things are or how you are not doing so well in one area or another. You will realise that you are only human. You make mistakes just like everybody else. You are not perfect just like everybody else.But don t stop there. Accepting that life is hard does not mean that you accept every circumstance and simply go with the flow.You see there are two sides to this story. There is another side to this coin. On the one side of the coin is where you have the words life is hard inscribed but if you turn that coin over you will five very small but powerful words. They read You can make it better That is one of the beautiful things about life. You can make your life better. You have total responsibility for what you do and how you respond to the fact that life is hard. As the now cliché saying goes If life hands you lemons make lemonade. Accepting that life is hard comes with accepting that you have the responsibility to make it better. Not only do you have the responsibility to make it better you have the ability and the power to make it better.You can make it better become a better employee and someone worth giving more responsibilities at work. The promotions and the better pay are sure to follow one way or another.You can make it better learn how to raise better kids and have a happier home. Become the good husband or wife you would like your spouse to be.You can make it better learn how to turn that business around. Gain the extra skills you need to run a successful business.You see the only person you have any control over is yourself. You cannot change other people. Let s take the example of marriage for moment. Notice that I did not say you should turn your husband or spouse into an ideal spouse. I said you should become the ideal husband or wife you want your spouse to be. Then once you become such a person you may have several choices as to how to relate to your spouse.Firstly once you are as near perfect a spouse as anyone can be your husband or wife might see the difference and also decide to change for the better or they may just change naturally as a response to your new attitude. Secondly if they don t change perhaps you will have reached a level of maturity where you are content and satisfied with who they are and their faults no longer bother you. Or thirdly in some cases such as in abusive relationships or in relationships that are a risk to your health you may reach a level of self acceptance and courage where you are able to leave that abusive or unfaithful partner.Whatever the case may be this example illustrates one other important fact about teh fact that life is hard and taking responsibility. That is You always have choices No matter what situation you are in you have a choice. No matter how bad things are you have a choice. No matter what you think you can or cannot do you have a choice.Now it may not be an easy choice by any means. It may be a very difficult choice and the road you decide to take may be a tough one. It may push you way out of your comfort zone. It may mean that in the initial period your life may get even harder than it already is. But it is a choice nonetheless.A lot of times you will actually find that the choices are not as hard as you thought they were. You may just hav
title: Rocket League®

review: This game is the best car simulator you could ever get/play! 1. You have different ways of getting cars just like in real life (you have to buy DLCs or open cases)2. You learn how to perfectly drive a car in different situations (use the walls or your boost to fly into the air)3. You can get petrol in the same way as you can in real (use the boost points which are scattered about the whole map)4. You get ranked for your driving performance (this shows if you should try to drive in real life or not)Bonus You don't need a driver license to use these cars!So if you ever are afraid of your next driving lesson just buy this game prepare yourself with some hours of practice and surprise your teacher with your new learned skills in driving!*No liability for damage or something similar* This game isn't a car simulator

review: This game... I really don't even know where to start so let's just do a pros and cons then get to some type of summary...or something...Pros EXPLOSIONS FAST ING FUEEEGOOOOO MENU MUSIC I'm about to cop the soundtrack Easy to pick up and play TONS of techniques can actually get pretty strategic No flopping for yellow cards Customization out the br&gt No really you get a new item like every game Growing competitive scene Matchmakes with console players tons of people online at onceCons UhhhThis game brought the kid back out of me I've never been so hype to come home and sit on my since I was like 7 all day at work all I could think of was flying cars and crazy goals this game is ecstasy in its purest form. Common negative points Servers I've had one server with rubberbanding and it really didn't last all but a minute and a half tops select a relevant region granted I'm in the USA so I have the freedom advantage. No replayability If you play sports games you will have all the replayability ever it's soccer the replayability is the game itself. Shallow singleplayer Honestly haven't even tried singleplayer so I can't speak on it. EDIT I played season mode for a little bit on single player the AI is very smart I really wouldn't be able to tell the difference between them or real players season mode seems pretty fun you pick a team with a premade livery and logo and you get to select team mates go through a season of however many games you chose and try to make the playoffs. EWW HATS C'mon they're fun don't be such a grouch.This game is one to support and I can't wait to watch it flourish. Go on my friends list and ask any of them what I think of trading cards and badges they'll tell you I hate them I CRAFTED THE BADGE FOR THIS GAME I DON'T EVEN KNOW WHO I AM ANYMORE! I CAN HAVE FUN GETTING TOMPED BY THE OTHER TEAM I LOST A GAME 8 0 AND STILL HAD A BLAST! Please buy this game you owe it to yourself to have this good of a time. $20 is NOTHING for this amount of entertainment.
title: Rocket League®

review: Frankly speaking I wasn't a football(soccer) fan but I saw how this game was gaining in popularity as a casual as well as competitive game. So I decided to try it myself and I will say I truly enjoy playing this game.I recommend this to both casual and competitive gamers. There are plenty of interesting and varied game modes to enjoy. The controls are easy to learn thanks to well created tutorials and practice modes. Also the community is nice and usually forgives beginners for mistakes. But if you have friends to play with learning to play will be much more comfortable in online matches. You could always practice with bots offline.Nominated and voted for it for the "5 more minutes" award. Always fun to play another match.

review: You're a child. It's your birthday. You've just turned ten.You leave your room in the morning to find your father standing in the kitchen big eating grin on his face. He grabs you by the hand. "Come on son I have something to show you." With a bit of fear you follow unsure of what you might find.He leads you through the house to the garage door and stop. He turns to you. "This is a turning point in your life son. Remember this day because this is when you become a man. Today you stop playing with your Hot Wheels. No more toy cars. Today you become a man."You open the door and you see it. The most beautiful thing in the world.He has bought you a racing go kart. The one you have always wanted.He helps you push it out of the garage and into the driveway. With a bit of strength (and Dad's help) you get it cranked. What a beautiful sound.You hop in ready to take on the world and pull into the street. Off you go.Nothing can stop youNow imagine your father intentionally removed all grip from the tires covered the street in oil and disabled the breaks.Welcome to Rocket League.

review: At first I found the controls a little difficult to master as they were very sensitive but I got the controller a couple of days after and found that to be a lot better. High internet speed is recommended as I'm in the highest speed area of my town and experienced lag when I didn't plug in my ethernet cable. Playing it is very fun and a friendly but competitive atmosphere quickly creeps in. Once customised controls are very responsive and games are fun. Granted I've not played for very long but I normally get tired of games very quickly but not in this case. In their original on the PS3 Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket Powered Battle Cars I played for weeks and weeks. I'd give it a solid 8 in all.
title: Rocket League®

review: I was very skeptical about this game at first. I dislike football and I don't really have something with cars either but what the heck it was a free weekend why not?So I started playing and I liked it near instantly for some reason so I kept playing for a few hours afterwards I bought the game immediately.What makes this game so great?This game is fairly easy to start and for people that have played some sort of racing game on a console/pc you'll adapt very fast. The physics in this game are fun and not too harsh ( like reality you would just fall like a brick but in this game you can make some pretty awesome air time). With this it is possible to do awesome air tricks and try to score ( which is a lot harder then it looks )But isn't this game repetitive?Isn't league of legends repetitive or every race game ever?You can make it as fun as you yourself want it to be. I generally play with friends and then it never gets old do stupid stuff and still make awesome goals. So compare it with league of legends you make awesome team combo's and you still enjoy the same map after a few hundred games.The soundtrackI still haven't considerd shutting it down it isn't anoying even so it is pretty good. Nothing more about that.GraphicsYeah no Would love to comment on this one but I am playing on a toaster so no comment. ( it does look nice tho )Final verdictI actually recommended this game to all my friends so we could play together. It doesn't take a long time for one game which makes it really nice for just one game ( HAH ever tried to shut it off after a winning streak? )You don't have to crack your brain on this game either it is playable for everyone!p.s. the communityWell this is fun. I have had a few guys that actually started cursing via voice and this wasn't the first time. I don't really mind I laughed they laughed and then we laughed. But if you you have a weak soul for faulmouthed people turn off the voice chat or only enable it for your team.
title: Rocket League®

review: I started playing Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket Powered Battle Cars when I was at my friend's house in the PS3. It was absolutely fun and we played it for almost 5 hours(yes that is kinda long). Now the sequel to the game just released and I am immediately excited for it.Rocket League delivers everything well from the gameplay mechanics customizable features graphics and... FUN! I have not tried playing this game on a mouse and keyboard though I've been playing it with a controller and it works fine. The game is easy to learn and hard to master. The only gripe I have with this game is that I have trouble connecting to the servers. Sometimes I can and when I do I actually quite amazed with the connection. I had a 154 ping(which you might think yeah that will ruin your game experience) but it didn't affect at all. It runs really well until someone joins the game and lags for 1 second but that is no issue. Of course there is no South East Asia (S.E.A) server which I hope they would make one.Now should you get this game? If you love driving(with extreme nitro and acrobatic skills) and a little bit of football then yes get it. This game is extremely fun. If you have friends even better! Go get it! its worth it. Encourage your friend to get it as well!

review: Disclaimer no you can't play with friends on console. The cross platform is through matchmaking only so it's just pure chance. They should not call this cross platform play.This game is just seriously fun. Even fun when you're bad at it. It's amazing with friends local multiplayer flawed experience online but great if you can get the LAN party environment going for it. I hope they eventually have multiplayer league support and essentially every mode that major sports games have because they would all be perfect.THIS GAME COULD GET ME WATCHING ESPORTS.I just can't recommend it highly enough.They really do need to get to work fixing the online experience though.I know this review seems to contradict itself but that's kind of how the game is. It's crazy amounts of fun with friends it really needs to be played. But the actual gameplay deserves more/better modes and better online and matchmaking.And claiming random matchmaking is cross platform play is just dirty but that's on the publisher not the game.

review: It would be fun if you did not have to play with random people. An online game so that is not possible. pro The game is great it's fun and there is a learning curve. A lot of cosmetic options to it that do not change the gameplay at all.con You need other people to play it. This comes (as usual) with an extreme ammount of idiots smurfs toxic ppl trade bots trolls terrible players afk people "sorry im deranking" people and a**holes in general. Just like every other online game in the history of games this one is also ruined by all the people playing it.pro Addictive enough to make you come back every day and simple enough not to make you tired after playing.con Causes a lot of stress and anger because of other people ruining 99% of your games.another con It has a simple but a 'high punishment' ranking system that will derank you much faster than let you rank up. With the game being what it is this rank is BARELY in your control. You will be ranked by the skill of people you play with and no matter how good you are someone is always bad enough to make your skill useless. Ofc this goes in the other way too. You WILL derank much better people because they will be unlucky enough to get you. It is a fact.Not recommended to anyone (like me) who does not have friends to play it with all the time and is forced to solo queue. If you DO have ppl to play it with and will NEVER have to queue solo it's a great game you will enjoy it.

review: Alright so I love Rocket League. I have many hours racked up on ps4. My cousin and I upgraded to the pc so that we could get those buttery frame rates. And for a time we did. We played about 3 matches earlier today and they went smooth. Had a lot of fun enjoyed ourselves blah blah blah.Then unfortunately we were unable to invite each other into a party. Every time we tried it gave us no confirmation that anything had happened and the other person recieved nothing. We suspected it may have something to do with our controllers(I have the xbox controller he has a ps4 one both wired into our pc) but unplugging them did nothing.After some quick googles I have gathered that other people have had similar problems but with no real sure fire solutions(at least none that worked for us). /Restarts didn't work verifying the integrity of our local files didn't work reinstalling didn't work. I love this game. ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT. But I can't recommend it for anyone who wants to play with a friend or family member because you may run into a similar problem. Please Psyonix please fix whatever bug this is. **It could also definitely be a steam overlay issue and I suspect it may be. If that's the case who knows when it will be fixed.**

review: first impression after a few rounds online play.AWESOME!The game looks pretty it controls pretty well (I am usually a keyboard/mouse player but for this I went with a 360 controller). and it is FUNFor now I estimate this is easy to learn and really hard to master. Right now (11th of july 2015) the game is "trending" and I expect it to become really popular. Finding players takes a few seconds. You can limit the region to search for servers (east us west us europa asia/australia). US seems to have a good number of players europe not yet so much. I did not see any server browser.I diddnt notice any bugs. But the game can be quite laggy if you end up on a far server and/or someone from far joins your server.should you get it? I think yes this is a game for almost everybody. I do not do racing games yet I like this. I dont play soccer games yet I like it. its just... fun!so if you can spare the 20 bucks buy it lets support the makers instead of yet another green light zombie disaster.if in doubt wait until it is available for a reduced price but I almost can promise that you will get a few hours joy out of it. at least for 20 bucks that is a fair deal!edit 24hrs later seems to have been a temporaty problem with the lag. no trouble finding players (eu) and lag has gone down noticeably. no more rubberbanding so far!

review: If you're looking for a game review you've come to the wrong place. But if youre looking for a fantastic ravioli recipe you've come to the right place.Ingredients To Make the Dough375 grams (3 cups) plain flour1/2 teaspoon salt2 eggs1/4 cup (50 ml / 3½ tablespoons) olive oil1/2 cup (120 ml / 8 tablespoons) waterExtra flour for dusting To Make Cheese Filling15 ounces (425 grams) container Ricotta cheese5 ounces (142 g/about 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons) "3 Cheese Italian Blend" (Parmesan Romano &amp Asiago)Note grate these cheeses yourself and create your own custom blend.1/2 cup cheddar cheese2 eggs lightly beaten1/2 teaspoon salt1/2 teaspoon pepper ExtrasYour favorite sauce for the ravioli (i.e. marinara/ marijuana)Parmesan cheeseBasilFried vegetablesShrimpFish slicesChicken pieces Make the Ravioli filling. In a small mixing bowl add the ricotta and mash with a fork. Add in the 3 cheese blend Cheddar cheese eggs salt and pepper. Mix all ingredients thoroughly until you have a smooth paste like consistency. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and place it in the refrigerator for about 30 minutes. Make the Ravioli dough. Crack eggs into a large mixing bowl and beat them with a fork. Add water oil and salt. Mix. Add 1 cup flour to the bowl. Use a fork to mix the flour with the eggs water oil and salt. Repeat with the rest of the flour. Mix until a smooth dough is formed. Clear and clean off a large work surface and dust it with flour. This is where you are going to roll out your dough. Take the dough out of the mixing bowl shape it into a ball and place it on your work surface. Knead for at least 10 minutes or until it becomes elastic. Dust a rolling pin with flour to prevent the dough from sticking. Roll out the dough until it is about 1/8 inch (1/3 cm) thick or about the thickness of 2 stacked quarters. With a cookie cutter or upside down water glass cut out circles in the dough (will make about 15 20 dough circles). Ball up the unused dough and either roll it out and make a couple more raviolis or wrap it and put in the freezer for another time. Dough can keep for weeks when frozen. Just make sure to wrap well so that it doesn t suffer from freezer burn or absorb freezer odor. Fill the Ravioli shells. Take the ravioli filling out of the refrigerator and place a tablespoon of it in middle of a dough. Fill a small bowl with water dip your fingers in and moisten around the outer edge of the dough circle. Fold the dough in half over the filling making a half moon shape. Be sure all the filling stays inside. Pinch the edges together and then seal the edges of the ravioli with a fork. Make sure to press firmly and go all the way around. This will add a homemade touch as well. Repeat this process for all your dough circles. Dust the finished ravioli with flour to keep them from sticking together. Form the Shells and Fill Using a Ravioli maker. Roll the dough into two sheets Place one sheet on the ravioli maker and form the filling cups. Fill with the ravioli mixture. Lay the second sheet of dough on top and roll it out. This will seal in the filling. Remove and separate the finished raviolis.Cook the Ravioli. Fill a large pot with water and bring to a boil. Place the ravioli in boiling water for 5 6 minutes or until they float. You can also test for doneness by nibbling on the edges to test. If you don't want to make all the ravioli at one time you can freeze the rest Take ravioli out of boiling water with large slotted spoon and place on warmed platesServe it up.Top with your favorite sauce grate some fresh cheese over it and enjoy!

review: Rocket League is a car soccer video game. The pressure in this game just wants to make you play more. The ranking may be a bit unfair but that isn't the point. title: Rocket League®

review: Rocket League is a very enjoyable team based game. Group up a couple of people and play or just go solo. Overall the performance is great the concept is great car customization is great and most things about it is great. Is there anything negative about this game? Unfortunately yes. Opponent finding. Sometimes a rookie can join a semi pro and go against 2 veterans which is really annoying. This is something that really needs to be fixed because it annoys the out of people. Being 2 rookies and a semi pro against 2 veterans and a pro is no fun. You should play with people on your own level. Not 20 levels above you. Anything else? Yes. I Find it hard to play one of the maps with only 20 FPS. This one map makes my FPS drop below 20 all the time. But only that one map which I rarely find.Scores and Reasons Positive Factors Score +15+++ Graphics Graphics are great and not too laggy (Except one map).++ Customization Great opportunities to customize your cars as you want.++ Ranking System Ranking up is hard. Very hard. But this just makes it funnier eh?+++ Performance It requires no beast PC to run this game at all. +++ Fast Servers The servers are quite fast to find you a game. I Have not waited any longer than 1 minute MAX to find a match.++ Good Singleplayer / Training The singleplayer part is fine and so is the training. The training really gets you through the different scenarios and can really help.Negative Factors Score 7 Opponent Finding Coming against 2 veterans while being 2 rookies is VERY annoying and really makes the game annoying. Laggy Map Only this one map is laggy. Too much stuff is happening in this map at once. Stupid AI For the bots joining you or the opponent I can't say much good. Their objective Hit the ball no matter what which often results them in either completely screwing up your go for it or even score on their own goal which is REALLY annoyingOverall Rating and Score Positive Score +15Negative Score 7Overall Score +8Overall a great game which needs some small finnishing touches. Great to play with friends and it has potential to even become a great eSports game. I Do recommend this game. It is worth the price.And jsut for all the people saying that you "learn from playing with better players" and I should "stop whining" I Do not learn sh*t from some veterans who Score 6 goals without talking to us about how and after that just calling us "Noobs" and saying "Easy" and after that instantly quit.
title: Rocket League®

review: Product received for free. I got this game for free when I ordered my steam controller. It didn't really look like a game I would like so it sat in my library for awhile before I finally decided to install it. And now it is one of my favourite games! This game is so fun and addictive I can play it all night or I can squeeze in a match when I have 10 minutes to spare (the game length is 5 minutes but if the people you're playing with dont skip the replays then it can take longer). Psyonix is continually adding free updates like hockey and basketball which keeps the game fresh. The game also has splitscreen so I can play with my friends which alot of PC games these days dont do. The DLC is just cosmetic so this isnt a pay to win game.TL DR THIS GAME IS SO FUN! BUY IT! YOU WONT REGRET IT!

NO contentos con los cofres que se pueden abrir.. espera me explico.. cuando tu juegas cada cierto tiempo al final de una partida regalan cofres las cuales no negare.. traen cosas muy bonitas y geniales.. pero para abrirlas cuesta dinero (Alrededor de 1.30 dolares la llave).. no contentos con eso.. tambien tiene una seccion para comprar coches exclusivos que la mayoria cuesta 3 dolares ... La comunidad.. No es TANNN toxica pero tampoco es perfecta tiene sus flamer o gente que se enoja facilmente...Pues nada mas... Yo la verdad recomiendo este juego es bastante entretenido y si... vale la pena comprarlo.. a mi me lo regalaron pero yo queria este juego de verdad y cuando tuve la oportunidad me gusto mucho ) Gracias

review: This game never gets old. Its such a basic concept yet its very addicting and very high skill cap. like with most good games it is extremely easy to get the grasp of you just shoot the ball into their net and keep it out of yours using a car but of course there is much more to it than that. I have now played over 200 hours and am still far from good at it. I consider myself decent but compared to the really good players i'm pure trash which i actually like. because i know that when i become that good i will be able to on noobs just like i get on now by extremely good players. New cars games modes and expansions get released pretty frequently to keep the game a little fresh since it CAN get repetitive but personally i haven't found it repetitive because of how addicting it is. The new cars/expansions are also fairly cheap (around 2 euros) which is good. 9/10 game for me

review: Although the most powerful individual in the Roman Empire Augustus wished to embody the spirit of Republican virtue and norms. He also wanted to relate to and connect with the concerns of the plebs and lay people. He achieved this through various means of generosity and a cutting back of lavish excess. In the year 29 BC Augustus paid 400 sesterces each to 250 000 citizens 1 000 sesterces each to 120 000 veterans in the colonies and spent 700 million sesterces in purchasing land for his soldiers to settle upon. 216 He also restored 82 different temples to display his care for the Roman pantheon of deities. 216 In 28 BC he melted down 80 silver statues erected in his likeness and in honor of him an attempt of his to appear frugal and modest. 216 The longevity of Augustus' reign and its legacy to the Roman world should not be overlooked as a key factor in its success. As Tacitus wrote the younger generations alive in AD 14 had never known any form of government other than the Principate. 217 Had Augustus died earlier (in 23 BC for instance) matters might have turned out differently. The attrition of the civil wars on the old Republican oligarchy and the longevity of Augustus therefore must be seen as major contributing factors in the transformation of the Roman state into a de facto monarchy in these years. Augustus' own experience his patience his tact and his political acumen also played their parts. He directed the future of the Empire down many lasting paths from the existence of a standing professional army stationed at or near the frontiers to the dynastic principle so often employed in the imperial succession to the embellishment of the capital at the emperor's expense. Augustus' ultimate legacy was the peace and prosperity the Empire enjoyed for the next two centuries under the system he initiated. His memory was enshrined in the political ethos of the Imperial age as a paradigm of the good emperor. Every Emperor of Rome adopted his name Caesar Augustus which gradually lost its character as a name and eventually became a title. 198 The Augustan era poets Virgil and Horace praised Augustus as a defender of Rome an upholder of moral justice and an individual who bore the brunt of responsibility in maintaining the empire. 218

review: I have gamed for 20+ years. I grew up with Nintendo Sega SNES N64 Wolfenstein Doom Quake every sports game ever made... I've watched video games progess into modern marvels of technology lived in west LA where they now put giant billboards of AAA games like CoD in the middle of Hollywood with celebrity endorsements. Watching the evolution of the gaming industry has been mind boggling. And this game tops anything I have ever played. It's pure simplicity the beautifully tuned physics/speed/gravity... the easy to jump into extremely insane in fact IMPOSSIBLE to master (I regularly watch the #1 player in the world Kronovi stream and I cannot count how many mistakes and missed opportunities he has every game). This game simulates playing a real sport better than any EA game ever could. Think about how many times Lebron James misses baskets Messi misses passes/goals/gets the ball stolen Peyton Manning overthrows a receiver... they are the best in the history of the game and they mess up all of the time. This game is exactly the same. The amount of precision and skill required to master the game is limitless. When you beat somebody you BEAT them. You didn't lose because you were outcomped like in a MOBA or you rolled the wrong class in the FOTM in an MMO or from catch up logic seen in many racing games. You lost because you were outskilled. I've never been so addicted to a game in my life... not because there's some gear grind or arbitrary progression forced to make me put hours into the game. No... I'm addicted because I can always get better... always. I get a little bit better every single time I play and I've put 200 hrs into this game. It's amazing and a STEAL for 20 bucks. Buy it get your friends to buy it play it love it and master it if you can!
title: Rocket League®

review: Sadly the game is turned into a shell of its former self filled with trolls griefers and tryhard toxic players which has finally resulted in me to place this game on the do not play list. After a thousand memorable hours playing with friends it's time to put this game back on the grayed out Steam library. I am tired of watching fellow teammates or even opposing teams kick and scream which does more harm than good. Not to mention the repetitive stale nature of this game that makes you regret sinking hours into it. Sadly Psyonix let toxic players run rampant for far too long. It wasn't until they started losing players did they finally take notice. Either that or Nintendo forced them to address it. I wish anyone who is trying to play this game solo the best of luck. In casual you will likely never end the game with the same teammate because of rage quitting. And the chances of you having to report a player in ranked is practically guaranteed whether it is for harassment or trolling. If you do not already own this game I would recommend staying away. Psyonix did this to themselves. Next time listen to the community instead of feeding the trolls.

review: Eğer oyunu alırsanız arkadaşlarınızla iyi vakit geçireceğine emin olun şimdi oyunu inceliyelim iyi yanları Oyunun oynanılabirliği bir hayli güzel size az bir tuş kombinasyonu sağlamasına rağmen yaratıcılığınızla maçta arkadaşlarınız birsürü trick yapabilirsiniz.(Combolar vs) Oyunun grafikleri de bir hayli güzel çevre kalitesi ve çevre sesleri sizi maçın içine sokuyor sanki.Ve ayrıca oyun futbol için gibi gözüksede basketbol hockey gibi modlarıda var he birde rumble modu var oda çok eğlenceli olabiliyor. Neyse şimdi kötü yanlarına geçelim.Birincisi abi bu matchmaking sistemi ne allah aşkına arada birşey sıkıştırayım bilgisayarınız çok iyide olsa abi o optimizasyon sorunu yüzünden önünü göremez oluyorsun babacım dislike like sistemi var dislikeladıgın maplerin maçta gelme olasılıgı azalıyor ancak o matchmaking sistemi yüzünden bütün dislikeladıgım mapler gelip duıruyor 3 maçta bir çıkmaz zorunda kalıyorum.Optimizasyonu düzeltirmisiniz lütfen aloo.Hitbox desen ayrı kanser topun soluna vuruyorum top bazen kalkıyor bazen bir gıdım ilerlemiyor anlamış değilim.Ping sistemi daha kötü 100 pingin oldumu sahayı sana gezdiriyor ışınlana ışınlana bir hal oluyorsun.Ama bunlara rağmen indirimdeyken alınabilecek bir oyun arkadaşlarınızla çook iyi eglenebilriisiniz.

review: First off let me just say this game is good and challenging and provides many many hours of good play. So why the negative review? First off this game has almost the worst community only narrowly being better than the call of duty community but atleast call of duty has the single player so u can still play and have a bit of fun without having to listen to all the complaints from the "im the best its just my team is quot gang. You can rank up pretty fast which actually makes playing this game even worst when u get there. The higher ranks are good really good! provides alot of challenges which is not a bad thing. But the community does not let you off with anything. Even when everyone on your team are playing their best theres always one "l33t" that thinks hes the best in the world and complains about the team and ruins the experience. There should be a bigger penalty for leaving games and forfeiting especially in competitve games. I played a game where each time we were winning the opposing team would equalize and each time that happened my team mates would vote to forfeit! EVERY TIME! and this happened like 3 or 4 times in a row. even when a game is only started and the opposing team gets a lucky goal in the first few seconds u can be sure there will be a forfeit vote! My advice is to play this game with the chat muted and play with your friends over teamspeak or discord. You'll be able to play better as a team that way and wont have to listen to the insecent kiddy whining if you can do that then i recommend this game! But trust me when u play and someone starts complaining about you being "noob" and then starts coming out with pre puber "i shagged your momma" jokes u will become more interested in giving a backlash than playing. Everytime that happens i refuse to even focus on the game and just let the other team win as payback to the whiney prick just because doing that makes me smile D

review: It's soccer with cars. With that said as someone who is not particularly fond of soccer this game is brilliant in its ability to turn what I consider to be a bland sport into something esquisite. The satisfaction of making a great save or getting a nice ariel hit is what keeps me coming back. Combine that with smooth car movement and team focused gameplay and you have the perfect game to wind down to with friends.While it does get repetitive after awhile short bursts of gameplay every few nights keeps the game entertaining enough to be a staple with my group. I would reccomend this game to anybody looking for a co operative focused game with casual relaxing gameplay.

review: I...Hate Football gamesHate car gamesHate football all togetherHate sportBUT...I LOVE THIS GAME!It is very easy to play/have fun for the everyday player but there is also a curve for you to take it to the real league. I started off playing my first 200 hours having fun and not having a care in the world. Then i got pretty good i practiced daily tried new things and the wow... i was 98th in the world got into platinum (season 1 top rank).... Next season comes along i hit the champion league (lowest of the top 3 divisions) i got up there with the big boys.. Every season after i have gotten into Grand Champion.. Got invited to play in the ESL tourney. I ACCEPTED! Now im a sweaty guy who takes his rank seriously..... What im saying is this game is for everyone you can spend countless hours having a laugh and doing all but playing around or you can take it to the next level and go into professional playing. The game really suits everyone and i would literally recommend it to anyone Honestly guys you cant go wrong with this buy.... Its not even that expensive really.10/10 My favorite game!
title: Rocket League®

review: Product received for free. This game combines Remote Controlled cars (WITH BOOSTERS ATTACHED) with soccer. The gameplay is great with a variety of maps to play and more comming it never gets old. There is an exibition mode (where you do 1 match with CPU opponents) also a campaign mode it is set up as Seasons of an acctual soccer game in this mode you take on bots of the skill level or your choice. The controls are great they are easy to understand easy to use. The CPU in the campaign mode and on the exibition are not that good. When a CPU gets assigned to the team you are on and you are in the lead your CPU "partner" will do a self goal on purpose going from one side of the map to your own goal. One thing that was irritating me was getting items. It isn't hard to get items you just play some online matches. I just keep getting dupes but wth the new update comming up that will no longer be a problem. Which I'm Glad to see the makers of this game hearing what the community is wanting. The CPU scoring on you is the only point I see that are not that good. It is not game breaking it is only a minor thing. Overall I give this a solid 9.5/10

Summoning all my courage I threw and watched in amazement as the bollock bounced from beast to beast killing each instantly! What magic is this?! I pondered. review: PROS AND CONS LISTED BELOW DO NOT WORRY ABOUT MY PLAYTIME I KNOW WHAT I AM SAYING Rocket League is a highly addicting and competitive game. It's you versus the enemy......and your teammates. You pass 2 oppontents with a swift rocket flight balancing the ball on your hood you roll to the left to bounce the ball on course right into the net. You land quickly jump and make a frontflip to dodge the third enemy they are past you it's you the net and the ball......oh nevermind your teammate just rammed you and screwed everything up ggHighly recommended but play it with friends trust me it will save your sanity.PROS AMAZING SOUNDTRACK SERIOUSLY WHOEVER MADE IT DESERVES A NATIONAL HERO TITLE (IT IS BETTER THAN HOTLINE MIAMI) Amazing optimalization the game will run no problem at stable 60FPS on a 2011 """""gaming""""" PC. Simple controls that you can learn in 10 minutes yet incredibly effective and fun! No microtransactions all parts are absolutely FREE! You get country flags other flags chassis decals rims paint rocket trails (everything is working on the drops system you can drop parts after matches don't worry it's frequent easy and not P2W) No cheaters! Works great with Xbox 360 Controller (recommended)CONS Cancerous selfish community ramming you all the time because they want to be the ones that score that goal. "gg ez lol noobs" (you'll be fine if you'll play with friends trust me)8/10 would get absolutely de_stroyed by my own teammates again.If you have any questions feel free to ask me.

review: Ok Rocket League Rocket League. The best analogy I can think of describing this game is a pair of fake knockers. When you first see or experience the surface of the game it'll be like finding tiddies but when you sink your head into it to feel the consistency of this game the truth will finally dawn upon you as you realize you're resting your head upon a pair of fake hooters.Rocket League is a game where two teams of cars are placed out on an open field and "mostly" play traditional football. The game feautures some solid mechanics for misc movement and controll. It's a competitiv and online focused experience where you'll be matched with/against others around your skill level or leauges above you.The game itself was originally designed with consoles in mind which you should keep at the top of the head fellow pc master race. In order to enjoy this game as a rather picky player there is quite a bucket of sins you're going to have to let slip through your fingers in order to enjoy (not take a at) this game.The premise of the game is quite simple indeed and the controlles are quite solid (When you pick up a pesant stick for what all thee hold sacred thou cannot with any level of patience and loyality play this gameth with our blessed interface which so cullionly forsook.) alas still not the best. As this game WILL feel clunky as all hell for some and despite a rather well feautured options menu it lacks the option to ajust your controller deadzone which is a rather... triggering minus. (And the developers actually defined an option in the input settings which governs the controller deadzone they just couldn't find themselves bothered enough to add a gradient bar in the options menu and title it accordingly.)Another nitpicky fact is that ALT+F4 does not work in this game. (Yes I do that sometimes.) But I really find that quite worrysome. ALT+F4 is a keystroke registered by the operative system Windows to attempt (not force) the current active window to close. And to this day I have not yet managed to deduce what causes this to not being registered while in Rocket League it's in no way been announced a feauture and the game definitivly has no need to lock down any controlls in game as some do. This little issue is likely the result of some shoddy coding and not a good sign by any means.Unless you find it to your amusement observing micro machines wannabees smacking a ball or find any entertainment value in the competitive thrill of hitting the ball and try to make look like a decent pass you're going to rely on good friends to give you any proper fun out of this. (Or you're after a ghetto TF2 where you don't have to spend money to get the hats labeled "Rare"). Although there is most certanly a good amusement to master it properly. A friendly advice from one human to another. Mastering a few parlour tricks and magic tricks can net you quite a bit more use for quite a bit less effort.This game is an online experience it's community is UNsurprisingly enough ridded with saltyborn and the toxickind and if it looked good and filled you with false hope at first sight you're quickly going to realize you've stumbled upon a pair of fake breasts. Then again there are two kinds of people in this world those who mind and those who don't.Sen_ signing out.
title: Rocket League®

review: A few wordsAt first i didnt like the game...It was laggy and difficult...I almost refunded it...Im still a bit angry because my pc meets the max system requirements and it still lags.I dont know if thats a mistake of the developers.Maybe they should change the stated requirements cause they seem to be wrong...Now.The game is at first very difficult and if you are like me you will struggle to even touch the ball.After some matches the game seems to become a lot more easier to predict and understand...There is where the magic comes...After you learn a bit about the game you can clearly see its one of the best sports games ever made (If not THE best...).Pros and ConsPros Prototype. Scoring a goal has its own awesome feeling. Competitive and rewarding. You dont like Football? Neither do i You dont like cars? I kinda like them It doesnt matter.You WILL like Rocket League! Awesome Tech like themed. Awesome graphics.Cons Your pc's performance is based on other people's ping. Lagging despite the fact my pc meets the requirements but its easily fixed by lowering the settings. Difficult to learn.Difficult to master.OverallThe game is difficult and maybe laggy.Fix the lag and train hard.Dont be like me.Give it a chance.Trust me it will reward you.Rate 8.5/10

review: When I bought this game I thought it would be fun to play and kill my spare time now its not as fun at all. I've started to experience more and more problems with the game and it just sucks. What bothers me Community is utter ****. They will disrespect/hate everything if they lose and even if they win too. That's not the case sometimes but usually that's what happens in competitive games. Which is something not so pleasant to stay around. Sure you can mute them but for the people that like to chat while playing its a big disadvantage. I did not expected a church like community but seriously they are ruining the game. Physics make no sense sometimes whatsoever. Rocket League's physics are unique and does not have that many bugs at all but the ones that it has are just miserable.*When your car should land smoothly after a fast flip/turn in the air but it just makes you unbalanced for a couple of seconds that count.*When you literally touch the ball and your touch is not affecting the ball at all even though your car 100% touched it. I often associate this bug with "going through the ball" that is because your touch does not even count. This started happening much more often that I was "used to" and its ****. The matchmaking is not accurate. You will sometimes play matches against people that are not in your league or vice versa. The worst is to have better enemies than your teammates leaving you the same as being outnumbered because your teammates are bad. This is what mostly keeps you from progressing. The trading system is okay except for one big downside that mostly leads to you being scammed. Rocket League's trading space of items you can put in to trade is small. This benefits people who want to scam and trust me there are a lot. Some items for example are worth more than the trading space Rocket League offers and the trade for those items usually go like "Yeah you put first your items then I'll put my item too." Now there are people that really don't scam in a situation like this but lets be honest this leads to scam 90% of the time. Other than this problem the trading system is really okay. Connectivity/Internet issues. Its just... ****. I have to admit my internet is not the best sometimes but mostly it is just fine. *Sometimes you will see the ball teleporting or freezing and you're going to be stuck in a confusing situation that could lead to the opposite team scoring most of the time. *Sometimes your ping will be high out of the blue when you've had good ping all day long or you'll just have high ping randomly between matches then its gonna be fine all day. Or who knows when you'll have its random as hell.*You might have packet loss 50% of time which is bad in two ways the UI distracting you from what is happening and making the game ****.*Hitting the ball but a slight lag making your play bad. Unlucky/Annoying Moments. Rocket League is not really to blame here but those are some situations that are just ridiculous *When you spend a lot of time in your enemy's half trying to score and he shoots in the wall/counters your shot on goal and it goes straight in your soccer gate.*When you do a counter but you're the one getting pushed away and not the ball leaving the enemy in a better position.*When your teammates/enemies pushes you making everything worse.*When your enemy only knows how to demolish and push you which is so annoying because it destroys the purpose of the whole game. Don't get me wrong demolishing and pushing are strategies but its like keeping you away from the game if used as the people I've encountered. Now this mostly depends on your enemies. It happened around relatively small number of times so I guess its not that much of a deal but it is annoying. Those are some problems that I've encountered during playing. Rocket League is a great game and its a lot of fun but when those things keep happening and you can't progress anymore because of them its not so good.
title: Rocket League®

review: I started off playing Rocket League on my Xbox One when it came out earlier this year but i have now made the switch over to PC and it is such a huge difference. In total i have about 400 hours combined hours both on steam and on Xbox and i have never grown bored of this game. Rocket League is so much fun to play even if you are on your own or with a friend or two there is always something interesting going on. Watching RLCS season one this year has made me loved the game even more and has actually inspired me to become better at the game and eventually find a team of my own to play for and hopefully get somewhere with it all. The likes of Rizzo Lachinio and Squishy Muffins have all inspired me to become better at the game and maybe one day be as good as them but i am still a long way from doing that. Rocket League has allowed me to meet a variety of different people from a lot of countries and has made playing a lot more fun and interesting. If Psyonix or Rocket League doesn't recieve some sort of reward for best game of 2016 or best sport game of 2016 i'll be severely dissappointed with whichever person or company has decided not to!
title: Rocket League®

review: Sometimes I sit and think who in their right mind would come up with soccer but with cars? Because that person is a true genius.Rocket League is a game where you play soccer but with cars. Their are even other modes such as basketball ice hockey and much more. You may think that it would get boring but with the games hundreds of thousands of car decals and collectables there really is something to keep you comin. Back for more. When it comes to playing the game there are its pros and it s cons. At a first glance you may think that Rocket League is for everyone ranging from kids to adults but the games cars take lots of time and practice to perfect manouvering the car and especially with the prize pools. Oh lord don t get me started on the prize pools. The game still offers great animations and some base items is you don t want to pay more than you need but it can still cause boredom after a short time.Pros and Cons about Rocket LeaguePros the game offers great animation and new innovative ways to play soccer/sport game has items from other tv shows movies and games to get you interested and make you want to play to get said items game has lost of different cars to chose from depending on playstyle game has hundreds of thousands of car decals for customisations and as a reward for playingCons game has prize pools/crates that cost money for exclusive/rare decals and import cars takes time to get used to controls game has slightly broken matchmaking system (friends and I have experienced bad/unfair matchmaking many times)Rocket League 6.5/10 recommended for patient and experienced gamers
title: Rocket League®

review: I definitely have a love hate relationship with Rocket League. This review honestly could have gone either way but I'm gonna play devil's advocate and give it a thumbs down despite my extended play time.The basics of it the concept physics and fast paced gameplay are awesome. There's no game remotely like it. If you measure the merit of a game simply by how many hours you're likely to play then Rocket League is right up there you're likely to get sucked in and play for dozens of hours.But after a certain point it became a negative experience for me. The matchmaking system leaves a lot to be desired. Way too often I found myself in 3v3 matches with expert players who would run circles around me and other players running up the score. It's really not fun when that happens even when the ringer is on my own team. Maybe this is a quaint sentiment but I usually play games to have fun and surmount a reasonable level of challenge not drive myself crazy trying to become a ninja master at them.The community can also be toxic but I guess you ll get that in most MMOs especially when the player base mushrooms. Most players are friendly but a minority are not. If you want to play for hundreds of hours in order to get good that s certainly your prerogative. But if you then criticize your anonymous teammates for not being up to your level it makes you nothing more than an obnoxious a hole. That s not really Psyonix s fault but if I m being honest it still drives me crazy. I wish it didn t but I guess that s just human nature /Anyway maybe matchmaking can be fixed. I don t really know but I d like to see Psyonix at least try to address it.
title: Rocket League®

review: I can sum this game up pretty easily with a single word FUN. If that is what you value in a game then read no further and buy this game. In fact buy a 4 pack share it with your friends and let the addiction take hold.Let me tell you a little story You had been eyeballing this game for a while with interest as you d seen some clips of it and it looked fun. But you couldn't get your friends to bite on it so you just kept it on your wishlist potentially waiting for a sale. You didn t have it in your coveted #1 most wanted position because after all who could put a simple indie game about rocket cars playing soccer above some much anticipated AAA release that is coming up. But you had it on there it s bright blue logo lying in stark contrast to the grim blood splattered wasteland that was the rest of your wishlist.Then it happened a Rocket League free weekend popped up when you logged into Steam on an average Thursday night. Sweet a chance to try it out and see if I enjoy it you thought. So you spent the next few nights of your free time playing it and then the weekend arrived. You had a few things to take care of but there was plenty of time to enjoy your new favorite game. You also managed to get one of your friends to try it out and they seem to really enjoy it as well. Since the game had now proven itself worthy of purchase you decided to pick up a 4 pack of the game.A few days had past and the weekend was nearing a close. And while the prospect of Monday was rapidly approaching you knew there wasn t much going on and you could take a sick day without much recourse. But then Tuesday turned into Wednesday turned into jeez you re really sick. It has only been one week since you got that first taste of free Rocket League and you ve already gone from almost respectable member of society to an adrenaline addled junkie who can t sleep and is looking for his next fix. Your responsibilities have been ignored divorce papers have been filed and even your dog is giving you serious looks of concern as the level of food in the feed bin has dwindled. You ve deleted your wishlist as there are no other games now and on top of all that your friends are now starting to show some of the symptoms as well. You ve got to be ready for work tomorrow but instead you re holding your game controller (which you bought to play Rocket League) in your hand crying. All this has happened because you decided to try Rocket League for free on the weekend one time. 10/10 would experience life devastating addiction again.But seriously now I'm not really much of a sports fan and my competitive streak has waned as I have gotten older. I mean I watch a little bit of college football when it is football season but I don't really get into it too much. But playing this game has a transformative effect and will have you shouting on every big goal or clutch defensive block from the moment you make your first big play. When the teams are evenly matched and a round goes into overtime things will get intense palms will get sweaty and friendships will be ended. But that's ok its all part of the process of letting go.When you first start playing the game you are immediately confronted with the fact that you are terrible. You ll whiff just trying to simply connect with the ball on an easy play. You ll get knocked into next week and sent tumbling across the field and unable to make a recovery for 15 seconds as you flail about. You ll plow the ball into your own goal amid cheers of Great pass! and What a save! from the other team. Being a complete disgrace to your team and your country combined with the fact that there is a guy on the opposing team who is flying around spiking the ball into the goal off of your face while eating everything you throw at him for lunch will bother you. But seeing what is possible will have you wanting to improve your game.Because the matches are only 5 minutes long it is ridiculously easy to get swept up in the desire to just play match after match and before you know it several hours have just flown by. The adrenaline rush of clutch plays is just so huge it really will get you pumped and you WILL have problems sleeping until you calm down (confirmed from friends). If you lack the discipline to just put the game down DAYS can easily go by in your quest to become the Kobe Bryant of Rocket League.If you are at all a fan of playing games to have fun do yourself a favor and play this game with some friends. If you don t have any friends you will undoubtedly make some along the way once you bust a few decent moves on the court.Edit 800 hours later can confirm its still life destroying.

review: After a while of not engaging in fun and enjoyable mulitplayer experiences I finally plucked up the courage to buy this wonderful piece of art. I actually played this game when it was on the 'Free to Play' weekend but then I never came back to it.First of all the game fundamentally replicates the theme of a football (soccer) match which initally sounded awful becuase I really don't like football...or any &lt enter body part&gt ball tbh. But I was so wrong. The standard mode of the game consists of a 3 vs 3 game where you attempt to score goals with a massive weird exploding ball. This is so competitive and fun to play and is more particularly enjoyable when accompanied by friends. We tend to get really in the spirit yelling at other players and eventually finishing with 'gg' regardless of the abusive shouted from both teams whether in text or voice chat. There's some good back and fourth banter going on when this happens (I cringed a bit writing that). Second of all the game consists of not just standard mode but also a RUMBLE MODE. This mode takes the game to a whole new level of enjoyment and laughter. Rumble is a mode which is constructed of the standard mode but then adds different power ups in which the player can uses to their advantage (and if you're me you'll manage to use them to your disadvantage). One of my favourite things about this game is the customisation of your car and the many MANY different flags and toppers that the player can earn after games. The game also includes different takes on different sports like hockey and basket ball but for me personally the fun is in waking one great massive ball at the back of the net.Overall I would reccomend this game if you and your friends are looking for a new game to play which is enjoyable funny and ADDICTING!

review: One of my longest torments in form of videogames. I should recommend this and would have about a year ago but now I must say this as it is. You feel bad most of the time playing this game. It starts with "uuuh and aaah"s and you're having fun at the beginning even awesome time when your skills develope and you start to raise in the ranks. It*s those even mathes where it starts to you off. Those games are too often decided with bounces caused by highly questinable physics that you never get used to. Frustration easily begins to ad up.This game is too fast and chaotic for proper tactics that rule in many ball games. Differences with cars are mostly cosmetic so there's not much to go from there either. Cosmetics are most of the time dumb and dull lost potential in my opinion. Chat in this game is full of people (8/10) that can turn happy man into a grim man. Only reasonable thing to do is to swich it off and therefore miss those nice people you would enjoy chatting with.This is not the game for those who play for fun and stress relief. This is a game for those who like to whip themselves and go to bed with sour mood. Play it if you will but be warned.

review: Rocket league has quickly become one of my favourite sports games to date. It has a pretty big learning curve but once you get the hang of how it plays and how the ball reacts to your car you'll have a great time. As with most multiplayer games this game is very enjoyable with friends. With that you'll also have more coordination with your teammates which will lead to more wins thus more fun. The only bad thing I can really think about is how toxic the community can be with chat spammers trash talkers smurfs etc. But most online games will have their fair share of those kinds of players. Rocket League is extremely well polished and plays great with smooth uncapped framerate good graphics great music selection (depending on taste of course) and the game is receiving updates monthly. Rocket League is a great purchase for people looking for a new game experience filled with exciting moments and fresh game mechanics.
title: Rocket League®

It's not fun and it needs to be fixed.No the answer isn't to "git gud" because I'm not trying to spend hundreds of hours doing that in this game. The answer is to fix your game.

review: OK So you've seen this game featured all over the web it looks kinda quirky and you're not too sure about it. Let me break down some reasons why this game is one of the most fun online experiences available.Think of it as a cross between Demolition Derby and Soccer/Football set in a futuristic enviroment where the cars are loaded with rockets (which require constant refueling) and battle for a massive ball on a caged field/pitch. The game is fast competitive and quickly addictive. Pros Extremely quick load times between games takes between 2 5 secconds. Yes really. Stable fluid online and offline play You share a profile which levels with you and unlocks new cosmetic looks to your cars. Simple controls fully embraces a controller for optimum gaming experience. Simple to learn difficult to master. Beautiful but simple graphics which are beautifully optimized. Online gameplay includes 1v1 2v2 3v3 4v4 and 1v1 2v2 3v3 Ranked. You can party up with up to 4 people local splitscreen up to 4 people (Yes on PC) Quick communication through the d pad seems to avoid nasty online communicationCons As far as I know you can only party up with people on your platform. IE) PC can only invite other steam players. This is a must have a massively fun unique and competitive game that ANYONE can enjoy to the point of ADDICTION!10/10 Will Score On Own Net Again
title: Rocket League®
